dialog: It's a journey by broomstick that shall take fifteen minutes.
What sort of wizarding establishments do we have nearby?
The neighborhood is home to renowned wizarding companies such as Mitsubishi, HP, IBM and many others.
Is the seventh floor also owned by our wizarding firm?
Indeed, our wizarding firm has claimed both the sixth and seventh floors of this building as its own.
Being such a grand firm, do we possess our own staff dining hall?
Indeed, it can be found at the end of the corridor.
Good morning, sir. How may I be of assistance?
Good morning, I have a meeting scheduled with Mr. Johnson at 10:00.
Forgive me, sir, but are you Mr. Richard of the World Trading Company?
Indeed, I am.
Apologies, Mr. Richard. Mr. Johnson is on his way to the office. He's just sent word that he'll be here soon and has asked you to wait a moment.
Very well, I shall wait.
May I offer you a drink, sir? Would you prefer coffee or tea?
Many thanks. I would like coffee, please.
Here you are, Mr. Richard. This is the cream, and here is the sugar. If there's anything else you require, do not hesitate to ask.
Much obliged.
Ministry of Magic emergency services, how may I assist you?
I must report a break-in.
At what time did this break-in occur?
